title: Pea and ham soup
ingredients: ['50g butter', '1 small onion, chopped', '1 or 2 bay leaves', '1 leek', '225g cooked and diced or shredded higher welfare ham or gammon, which is labelled Freedom Food, outdoor reared, outdoor bred, free-range or organic', '455g frozen peas or any leftover peas you may have after Christmas', '750ml chicken or vegetable stock', '4 tablespoons double cream or natural fromage frais (which ever you may have left over)', '2 tablespoons freshly chopped parsley', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
